article_title: Meet The Newest Member Of Your Personal Healthcare Team

article_metadata.author: Robert J. Szczerba

og.description: In Medication Therapy Management (MTM), a pharmacist evaluates a patient’s prescriptions and how the patient is feeling to identify and resolve issues including: untreated conditions, drug interactions, adverse drug reactions, inappropriate drugs or doses, and whether a patient is taking the medications as prescribed. The local pharmacist is rapidly becoming the newest member of your personal healthcare team.
